_header: Then all your doings should here in earth
_description: Verses on Following Christ’s Word — six quatrains (aabb) and burden (cc): ‘Be mery all with one accorde / And be ye folowers of crystes worde’

CamTCC1359.First Lines:
I wold our lyfe now coulde be sychehe was full poure to make vs
                    ryche…
CamTCC1359.Last Lines:
…for we be faire fane from this deegrefor how we lyue all men
                    may see
CamTCC1359.Note: Repeats burden, stanza 1, two new stanzas, beginning of 4.
